data.description:
Overview


Keysight is on the forefront of technology innovation, delivering breakthroughs and trusted insights in electronic design, simulation, prototyping, test, manufacturing, and optimization. Our ~15,000 employees create world-class solutions in communications, 5G, automotive, energy, quantum, aerospace, defense, and semiconductor markets for customers in over 100 countries. Learn more about what we do.

 

Our award-winning culture embraces a bold vision of where technology can take us and a passion for tackling challenging problems with industry-first solutions. We believe that when people feel a sense of belonging, they can be more creative, innovative, and thrive at all points in their careers.


Responsibilities


Keysight PathWave Software Solutions(PSS) is Keysight’s electronic design automation (EDA) business that creates tools, workflows, solutions and devices to accelerate customer development cycles for complex, high frequency circuit, modules, boards and systems.

 

We are looking to hire a motivated individual to join the circuit simulation team in PSS. Your focus will on the architecture support and new AI/ML for the circuit simulation engines. You will work on a variety of aspects of software engineering, such as architectural improvement, refactoring, code optimization, and the development of new algorithms and new AI/ML tools. You will investigate new technologies and their applications. Conduct design reviews, usability testing and customer visits to validate requirements.  Collaborate with other R&D teams to form holistic solution across the board.  Promote best practices in software engineering such as test-driven development, up-front design, code review, unit testing, etc. in our Agile Development Framework.


Qualifications


 

Keysight PathWave Software Solutions(PSS) is Keysight’s electronic design automation (EDA) business that creates tools, workflows, solutions and devices to accelerate customer development cycles for complex, high frequency circuit, modules, boards and systems.

  • Prefer master's degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related fields.
  • Track record of hands-on experience in complex software architecture development
  • Expert working knowledge of C++ and object-oriented programming. Exposure to other language families (Python, rust, etc.) is desirable.
  • Knowledge of AI/ML and database creation with training and fine tuning.
  • Good understanding of software development practices and software architecture 
  • Great team player with ability to work in a multi-site, multi-cultural team environment 
  • Outstanding communication and project management skills

Pay Range:

 

$29-31/hour

 

 

 

Careers Privacy Statement***Keysight is an Equal Opportunity Employer.***
